titleStmt.title: A relation of the miraculous cure of Susannah Arch of a leprosy and ptysick, wherewith for some years past she had been sorely afflicted.
titleStmt.author: Arch, Susannah.
Hume, Robert, apothecary, attributed name.
Fortey, Thomas.
Nichols, Charles, b. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. D. and sold by R. Baldwin in Warwick-lane,

notesStmt.note: First person narrative signed at end: Susannah Arch.
Includes signed testimonials from Dr. Charles Nicholls and Mr. Thomas Forty and Mr. Robert Hume, apothecaries.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
